name: Process Dump via Comsvcs DLL
description: Detects process memory dump via comsvcs.dll and rundll32
pattern:
title: Process Dump via Comsvcs DLL
id: 09e6d5c0-05b8-4ff8-9eeb-043046ec774c
status: experimental
description: Detects process memory dump via comsvcs.dll and rundll32
references:
    - https://modexp.wordpress.com/2019/08/30/minidumpwritedump-via-com-services-dll/
    - https://twitter.com/SBousseaden/status/1167417096374050817
author: Modexp (idea)
date: 2019/09/02
logsource:
    category: process_creation
    product: windows
detection:
    rundll_image:
        Image: '*\rundll32.exe'
    rundll_ofn:
        OriginalFileName: 'RUNDLL32.EXE'
    selection:
        CommandLine:
            - '*comsvcs*MiniDump*full*'
            - '*comsvcs*MiniDumpW*full*'
    condition: (rundll_image or rundll_ofn) and selection
fields:
    - CommandLine
    - ParentCommandLine
tags:
    - attack.credential_access
    - attack.t1003
falsepositives:
    - unknown
level: medium
